thread.title: Taylor Swift is the queen of Instagram with a massive 45m followers | DailyTelegraph
thread.title_full: Taylor Swift is the queen of Instagram with a massive 45m followers | DailyTelegraph

author: AAP and Network Writers
title: Taylor Swift is the queen of Instagram with a massive 45m followers | DailyTelegraph
text:
TAYLOR Swift has been crowned the new queen of Instagram after racking up a thousand more followers than former leader Kim Kardashian.
The selfie queen set a new record for the most Instagram followers last month after dethroning Beyonce with a staggering 45.4 million fans, but now Swift has swooped in to steal the title with 45.5 million devotees.
Taylor Swift with cat, Olivia Benson Other celebrities featured in Instagram’s new top 10 include Justin Bieber, his ex-girlfriend Selena Gomez, and Ariana Grande.
One-time queen (and Swift enemy) Katy Perry is lagging way behind with a meagre 27.1 million followers.
Other Stories Shot by police to prevent rampage News 0 comments Sales’ cutting question for PM Television How Hayne left Aussie businessman devastated More Sports 0 comments How Duran Duran got their groove back Entertainment 0 comments Why being an escort has made me a better mother Rendezview 0 comments ‘Safety is my middle name’ Nsw 0 comments Swift, of course, has long been an expert at using social media to connect directly with her millions of fans, messaging followers directly, or even going to visit them bearing gifts.
Kim Kardashian dethroned by Swift
She’s also been using her current 1989 World Tour as a way to invite her many famous mates on stage (and generating a few more Instagram posts in the process). So far the likes of Cara Delevingne, Lena Dunham, Ellen DeGeneres, Mary J Blige, Ed Sheeran and Selena Gomez have all taken the stage with the star. Something tells us Katy Perry won’t be showing up any time soon.
Former Instagram queen, Beyonce Originally published as Swift rules Instagram with 45m fans
